bibl.title: Papyri, Archaeology, and Modern History: A Contextual Study of the Beginnings of Papyrology and Egyptology.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Updated version of a paper given at the University of California, Berkeley in 2006 < http://tebtunis.berkeley.edu/lecture/arch >. See also: Paola Davoli, Papiri, archeologia e storia moderna, Papiro e mondo antico I = AeR N.S., 2 (2008) 1-2, pp. 100-124, 5 figg. - 1. The Cultural and Legal Context of the First Discoveries. - 2. El-Fayyum and Its Papyri. - 3. Antiquities, Politics, and Economy. - 4. ""Excavations of Papyri"" from 1895 to the Second World War. - 5. Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Paola Davoli, Papyri, Archaeology, and Modern History: A Contextual Study of the Beginnings of Papyrology and Egyptology.

Updated version of a paper given at the University of California, Berkeley in 2006 < http://tebtunis.berkeley.edu/lecture/arch >. El-Fayyum and Its Papyri. - 3. Antiquities, Politics, and Economy. - 4. ""Excavations of Papyri"" from 1895 to the Second World War. - 5. Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
